Agrivolution’s documentation¶

Agrivolution is a tool able to view croplands statistics from Occitania and Catalonia, grouped according to the icc classification.

This documentation is structured into 4 distinct parts :
  1. Tutorials

    Start here: Prepare your LPIS data from Occitania and Catalonia, prepare the environment, download the code source, make your first visualisation !

    In this section, you will be supervised with detailed instructions to learn to be familiar with the main function of the tool.

  2. How-to-guide

    View how statistics have evolved through the time, change the classification used.

    Here, you will be guided to solve specific problem with series of short steps.

  3. Reference

    Read information about key functions.

    This part contains the description of the tool.

  4. Explanation

    Understand the context and the potential development of this croplands statistics visualizations tool.

  • 1. Tutorials
  • 2. How-to-guide
  • 3. Reference
  • 4. Explanation
